name: Altars
description: Altars are the main desired product of manipulating psychic energy. They are structures which absorb psychicness and put it to use in some functional manner.$(br2)$(l)$(o)Note:$() Whenever you see a barrel in an altar diagram, you may replace it with any inventory block. Barrels, chests, modded inventories, Refined Storage interfaces, and more are all valid.
